recipesJson.name: Totally Peach’s ”N”Cream
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: Just a nice peaches and cream recipe. Nice and Sweet and really creamy. Needs about 2-3 days Steep. Mixed at 65/35. I mix juicy peach this high as I don’t really taste that peach unless it’s above 6% or higher. The nectarine make the juicyness of the peach more vibrant, without adding an off note to the recipe.
